title: Haven't Played much this year, logged on month ago and now Im banned
body:
Hey,

Haven't played much LoL this year and was going to play a month or so ago so I updated and logged on without any problems; though I didn't play a game I logged in fine. Now I was thinking of playing a game and this time after a short update once I logged on I got a notification that I had been "permanently banned". I'm not sure which email address I linked with my account as I made it so long ago so I can't check an email to see the problem.

I can't really imagine a reason why I'd be banned other than occasionally leaving games when my internet disconnects or computer stops working. I don't think I get into too many arguments. 

Just curious to know why I've been banned and if there's anything to rectify my account.

Thanks,

replies.body: Submit a ticket to player support, it was possibly due to the third party banwave recently, which if you haven't been playing, likely means your account was compromised. If you get a response that says you were banned for third party/scripting and you didn't use any such thing or give your account details to anyone for any reason, then submit a new ticket for Account Recovery (make sure you are logged out of the support site to do this) and go through the process there.
